Spinal cord border cell.DefiningCitation: SPRAGUE JM. Spinal border cells and their role in postural mechanism (Schiff-Sherrington phenomenon). J Neurophysiol. 1953 Sep;16(5):464-74
Spinal cord border cell.Definition: Neuron in the ventral horn of lower thoracic/upper lumbar levels in rat, cat and monkey, regarded as the origin of the ventral spinocerebellar tract
